titleStmt.title: Scribal colophons in the Tibetan manuscripts at the British Library (Prajñāpāramitā and Aparimitāyus sūtras)
titleStmt.author: Marta Matko
Sam van Schaik

editionStmt.respStmt: Converted to XML encoding by Sam van Schaik

encodingDesc.editorialDecl: Imported to 4D in July 2013 by Sam van Schaik.

head.p: This catalogue compiles all of the scribal colophons from the British Library manuscripts of thePrajñāpāramitāandAparimitāyussūtras produced during the Tibetan empire during the 830s and 840s. Transliterations are in the Wylie convention, with the addition of capital I for the reversegi gu, and $ for the opening curl.
